an4.242:1: "Sappurisaṁ, bhikkhave, nissāya cattāro ānisaṁsā pāṭikaṅkhā. Katame cattāro? Ariyena sīlena vaḍḍhati, ariyena samādhinā vaḍḍhati, ariyāya paññāya vaḍḍhati, ariyāya vimuttiyā vaḍḍhati – sappurisaṁ, bhikkhave, nissāya ime cattāro ānisaṁsā pāṭikaṅkhā"ti.
an4.242:2: Saṅkhitta vitthāra soṇakāyana,Sikkhāpadaṁ ariyamaggo bojjhaṅgaṁ;Sāvajjañceva abyābajjhaṁ,Samaṇo ca sappurisānisaṁsoti.
